menus.text: What to do in each day

tips.text: If you don't have time to do all the event,open event menu and do the event that have a gold star in the event icon first
Try to fill the Solo exp in each day
Time mention in guide is server time not game time

dailies.text: Find a 5-man party running 2 Devil Awake + 5 Dragon apostile. (You can run dragon apostle 15 times to farm assist point and it's small chance to get bonus drop even you already done it 5 times)
Participate in Day of Liberty(Cross-server PVP) You don't need to win to finish the daily
In Sat. and Sun. You'll have another quest to win 2 round of Day of Liberty
12.30 Club activities varies in each day
21.00 Club activities varies in each day
